itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide.

item.name: Deer Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted deer corpse.

item.name: Sheep Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted sheep corpse.

item.name: Fox Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted fox corpse.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Merchant Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Merchant Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 18, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Trade Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Trade Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 16, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Combat Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Durable heavy saddle made of hard leather that is purpose built for battle.
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Sturdier and lighter saddle made of high-quality leather
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Fine Soft Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Vangertz Shield of Destruction
